title: "Using artificial intelligence to understand lung and bronchus cancer mortality rates"
excerpt: "Many people think of robots when they hear the term \"artificial intelligence (AI).\" However, in the case of a new study on lung and bronchus cancer (LBC) in the U.S., AI refers to various machine learning models stacked together to make high-level predictions about LBC mortality rates."
